jam.io
Class ImpExpXSYS

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jam.io.ImpExp
        |
        +--jam.io.ImpExpXSYS
All Implemented Interfaces:
jam.io.XsysHeader
public class ImpExpXSYS
extends ImpExp
implements jam.io.XsysHeader

Imports and Exports Histograms files using the XSYS format. XSYS is a data Acquistion program written at TUNL, and is used at NPL in Seattle. Only import implement as of June 98. A page for VMS is 128x4=512 bytes long.

Version:
0.5
Author:
Ken Swartz
